name: DEAD SHOT - 2 Minutes of Terror With Predator Walking Beast, The Slender Man, Zombie & Chupacabra Survival Horror
name_original: DEAD SHOT - 2 Minutes of Terror With Predator Walking Beast, The Slender Man, Zombie & Chupacabra Survival Horror
description:
HUNT or BE HUNTED! - Awesome Horror Sniper Game
Now with REAL TIME Multiplayer!

How many undead creatures can you snipe in the time limit?

You awake dazed, confused with a bandage over one eye.
You can't remember who or where you are. What the funk?

Suddenly you are attacked and it feels like it's not the first
time. You grab a gun, lock and load and get ready for Two
Minutes of Terror....

• Story driven game play
• Stunning 3D graphics
• Awesome shooting mechanics
• Slick FPS controls
• Utterly terrifying
• Immersive music and sound FX
• Suffocating restricted vision mechanic
• Tons of weapon upgrades
• Epic bullet time camera

Download the ultimate survival horror game now if you dare...
